report.title: NatureSpot Download range of records
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM samples lt0 INNER JOIN occurrences lt4 ON (lt4.sample_id = lt0.id AND lt4.deleted = FALSE) LEFT JOIN locations l on l.id=lt0.location_id LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values recorder on recorder.sample_id=lt0.id and recorder.deleted=false and recorder.sample_attribute_id=22 LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values savfirst on savfirst.sample_id=lt0.id and savfirst.deleted=false and savfirst.sample_attribute_id=36 LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values savlast on savlast.sample_id=lt0.id and savlast.deleted=false and savlast.sample_attribute_id=58 LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values abund on abund.occurrence_id=lt4.id and abund.deleted=false and abund.occurrence_attribute_id=16 LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values verif on verif.occurrence_id=lt4.id and verif.deleted=false and verif.occurrence_attribute_id=19 LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values det on det.occurrence_id=lt4.id and det.deleted=false and det.occurrence_attribute_id=18 LEFT JOIN (occurrence_attribute_values conf INNER JOIN termlists_terms tlt on tlt.id=conf.int_value AND tlt.deleted=false INNER JOIN terms t on t.id=tlt.term_id and t.deleted=false ) on conf.occurrence_id=lt4.id and conf.deleted=false and conf.occurrence_attribute_id=17 JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists ttl on ttl.id=lt4.taxa_taxon_list_id LEFT JOIN users uv on uv.id=lt4.verified_by_id and uv.deleted=false LEFT JOIN people pv on pv.id=uv.person_id and pv.deleted=false LEFT JOIN occurrence_comments oc ON oc.occurrence_id=lt4.id AND oc.deleted=false AND oc.record_status IS NOT NULL #joins# WHERE lt0.survey_id = 15 and lt0.deleted = FALSE AND (lt4.id>=#from_id# OR #from_id# = 0) AND (lt4.id<=#to_id# OR #to_id# = 0) GROUP BY lt4.id, ttl.taxon_group, ttl.taxon, ttl.preferred_taxon, ttl.default_common_name, ttl.external_key, lt0.entered_sref, CASE WHEN lt0.location_name='' THEN l.name ELSE COALESCE(lt0.location_name, l.name) END, COALESCE( coalesce(savfirst.text_value || ' ', '') || savlast.text_value, recorder.text_value, lt0.recorder_names ), det.text_value, verif.int_value, t.term, abund.text_value, lt4.comment, lt0.comment, lt4.created_on, lt4.updated_on, lt0.date_start, lt0.date_end, lt0.date_type, lt4.record_status, lt4.record_substatus, pv.surname, pv.first_name, lt4.verified_on #order_by#
report.field_sql: lt4.id AS lt4_id, ttl.taxon_group AS lt7_title, ttl.taxon AS lt6_taxon, ttl.preferred_taxon AS latin, ttl.default_common_name AS common, ttl.external_key AS lt6_external_key, '' AS lt0_date, lt0.entered_sref AS lt0_entered_sref, CASE WHEN lt0.location_name='' THEN l.name ELSE COALESCE(lt0.location_name, l.name) END AS lt0_location_name, COALESCE( coalesce(savfirst.text_value || ' ', '') || savlast.text_value, recorder.text_value, lt0.recorder_names ) AS lt0_recorder_names, det.text_value as determiner, verif.int_value as verification, t.term as confidence, abund.text_value as abundance, lt4.comment AS lt4_comment, lt0.comment AS lt0_comment, lt4.created_on AS lt4_created_on, lt4.updated_on AS lt4_updated_on, lt0.date_start AS lt0_date_start, lt0.date_end AS lt0_date_end, lt0.date_type AS lt0_date_type, case lt4.record_status || coalesce(lt4.record_substatus::varchar, '') when 'V' then 'accepted' when 'V1' then 'accepted as correct' when 'V2' then 'accepted as considered correct' when 'C' then 'not reviewed' when 'C3' then 'plausible' when 'D' then 'queried' when 'R' then 'not accepted' when 'R4' then 'not accepted as unable to review' when 'R5' then 'not accepted as incorrect' end as record_status, pv.surname || ', ' || pv.first_name as verifier, lt4.verified_on, string_agg(oc.comment, '; ') as verifier_comment, 'https://www.brc.ac.uk/irecord/record-details?occurrence_id=' || lt4.id::varchar as record_link

param.name: from_id
param.description: Enter the ID of the first record in the range to include.

param.name: to_id
param.description: Enter the ID of the last record in the range to include.

param.name: site
param.join: JOIN locations lfilt on st_intersects(lfilt.boundary_geom, lt0.geom) and lfilt.location_type_id=14 and lfilt.deleted=false and lfilt.id=#site# JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=lfilt.id and lw.deleted=false and lw.website_id=8
